title: could this be Mostra Nuova
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20091027033242im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/M-Nuova_6370.png)

well.. yes of course it is!!!

I checked Marximonsons site today and found his fantastic Mostra Nuova so I had to insert this hidden commercial for it.

No No No.. I did not get paid by Mark to do this.
author: rosmedia

comments.content:
That’s OK, we all like Mark here. He’s one of us.

- Mike Yanega
